property.name: text
property.value: Send a counting sequence to a browser display.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Accessor that connects with a browser on the local host. This is intended to be used by a swarmlet to interact with users, for example by providing forms to be filled in. For now, however, it simply displays HTML provided to its input.

property.name: html (port)
property.value: An HTML document to render in the browser.

property.name: resources (port)
property.value: An object where each named property is an object containing two properties, 'data' and 'contentType'. The name of the named property is the path to be used to access the resource. The 'data' property is the resource itself, an arbitrary collection of bytes. The 'contentType' is the MIME type of the data.

property.name: header
property.value: <title>Graph2d or Basic Example</title> <style type="text/css"> body, html {font-family: sans-serif;} </style> <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/vis/4.16.1/vis.min.js"></script> <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/vis/4.16.1/vis.min.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: description
property.value: Test accessor that spontaneously produces outputs once per time interval. This implementation produces a counting sequence.

property.name: output (port)
property.value: Output for the counting sequence, of type number.

property.name: interval (parameter)
property.value: The interval between outputs in milliseconds.
